bugPattern.name: rst_absence_on_close_state
bugPattern.description: fails to respond with a RST one close state while receiving unexpected message.

bugPattern.name: rst_absence_on_listen_state
bugPattern.description: fails to respond with a RST one listen state while receiving unexpected message.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack(close_wait and time_wait)
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of close_wait and time wait.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack(established)
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of established.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack(fin_wait)
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of fin_wait1/2.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack(last_ack)
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of last_ack.
